A.name: Наименование субьекта
A.caption: Наименование субьекта
A.formula: select NAME from AGENT where ID=@AGENT::bigint

A.name: Учетный год
A.caption: Учетный год
A.formula: date_part('year', now())

A.name: Дата постановки на учет в ФНС
A.caption: Дата ФНС
Номер
A.formula: select coalesce(regexp_replace(max(lpad(docnumb,80,' ')), '[^0-9]', '', 'g')::int+1,1) from @TABLENAME where doctypeid=@DOCTYPEID ::bigint and cid=0

A.caption: Номер
A.formula: select coalesce(regexp_replace(max(lpad(docnumb,80,' ')), '[^0-9]', '', 'g')::int+1,1) from @TABLENAME where doctypeid=@DOCTYPEID ::bigint and docpref = @DOCPREF and cid=0

A.name: Имя файла
A.caption: Имя файла
A.formula: select f.filename from filelinks f where f.id = @FILELINKSID ::bigint

A.name: Размер файла
A.caption: Размер файла
A.formula: select f.size from filelinks f where f.id = @FILELINKSID ::bigint

A.name: Дата загрузки файла
A.caption: Дата загрузки файла
A.formula: select f.docdate from filelinks f where f.id = @FILELINKSID ::bigint

A.name: Настройки фильтра
A.formula: case when @FILTER = 'false' then null else (select b.filterinfo from configcolumnsbuff b where b.id = @ID ::bigint) end

A.name: Тип
A.caption: Тип
A.formula: select u.classnode from units u where u.id = @UNITID::bigint

AI.name: Текстовый файл с полями фиксированной длины

A.formula: select coalesce(max(position)+1,1) from conceptitems where conceptid=@CONCEPTID ::bigint and hid is null and @HID is null or hid=@HID ::bigint and cid=0

A.name: Тип элемента
A.caption: Тип элемента
A.formula: P_SYSTEM_CONCEPTITEMS_GET_TYPE(@ID ::bigint, @ATTR ::boolean)
select conceptid from conv where id=@CONVID::bigint
select coalesce(max(position)+1,1) from convacts where convid=@CONVID ::bigint and hid is null and @HID is null or hid=@HID ::bigint and cid=0

A.name: Таблица формата
A.caption: Таблица формата
A.formula: select coalesce(@CONCEPTITEMID ::bigint, min(id)) from conceptitems where conceptid=@CONCEPTID ::bigint and hid is null and cid=0

A.name: Наименование
A.caption: Наименование
A.query: select upper(tablename) as id, (select coalesce(upper(tablename)||' - '||max(m.name),upper(tablename)) from metaclass m where m.classnode='TABLE' and m.code=upper(tablename)) as code from pg_tables where schemaname = 'public' and @CONVUNITTYPE = 'table' union all select upper(p.proname) as id, (select coalesce(upper(p.proname)||' - '||max(m.name),upper(p.proname)) from metaclass m, metaclassprops mp where m.classnode='ACTION' and m.id = mp.metaclassid and mp.propnode='procedure' and lower(mp.strvalue)=p.proname) as code from pg_proc p, pg_namespace s where p.pronamespace = s.oid and s.nspname='public' and @CONVUNITTYPE = 'procedure'

A.name: Действие
A.caption: Действие
A.formula: (select 'Insert' where @CONVUNITTYPE = 'table' union all select 'Execute' where @CONVUNITTYPE = 'procedure')
A.query: select 'Insert' as id, 'Добавить, если нет записи' as code where @CONVUNITTYPE = 'table' union all select 'Update' as id, 'Исправить, если есть запись' as code where @CONVUNITTYPE = 'table' union all select 'UpdateNotNull' as id, 'Исправить, ошибка если нет записи' as code where @CONVUNITTYPE = 'table' union all select 'Select' as id, 'Поиск записи' as code where @CONVUNITTYPE = 'table' union all select 'SelectNotNull' as id, 'Поиск, ошибка если нет записи' as code where @CONVUNITTYPE = 'table' union all select 'Execute' as id, 'Выполнить процедуру' as code where @CONVUNITTYPE = 'procedure'

A.formula: select a.convid from convacts a where a.id=@CONVACTID ::bigint
select n.conceptid from conv n, convacts a where a.id=@CONVACTID ::bigint and a.convid=n.id
select ''||a.position||'.'||@CODE from convacts a where a.id=@CONVACTID ::bigint

A.name: Идентификатор
A.caption: Идентификатор
A.formula: select coalesce(max(numb)+1,1)::int from convloads where convid=@CONVID ::bigint and cid=0
select @ID
select c.conceptid from convloads l, conv c where l.id=@CONVLOADID ::bigint and l.convid = c.id
select convid from convloads where id=@CONVLOADID ::bigint

A.name: Наименование
A.caption: Наименование
A.formula: select lpad(@POSITION ::text ,5, ' ') ||'.'|| a.convunit from convacts a where a.id=@CONVACTID ::bigint
select convactid from convloadacts where id=@CONVLOADACTID ::bigint

A.name: Наименование
A.caption: Наименование
A.formula: select f.name from convactparams f where f.id = @CONVACTPARAMID ::bigint

A.formula: select p_get_Geo_fullname(@GEO ::bigint)

TABLE.name: Ведение БР - спецификация KBK
TABLE.query: select s.ID, s.HID, s.LID, s.CID, s.UID, s.TIM, s.BUDG_LIST_PROCESS, s.NAME, k.KBK_OUT, k.SUMM from BUDG_LIST_PROCESS_SPC s, BUDG_LIST_PROCESS_KBK k where s.id = k.BUDG_LIST_PROCESS_SPC

A.formula: select coalesce( max(SORT_NUM)::bigint+1,1) from @TABLENAME where BUDG_LIST_PROCESS = @BUDG_LIST_PROCESS::bigint and cid=0 and IS_CALC='False'

A.name: Сумма
A.caption: Сумма
A.formula: select sum(k.summ) from BUDG_LIST_PROCESS_KBK k where k.BUDG_LIST_PROCESS_SPC=@ID::bigint
